briefTitle: Effect of Combined Aerobic and Resisted Exercise in Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: Effect of Combined Aerobic and Resisted Exercise in Breast Cancer Survivors: Upper Extremity Function, Quality of Life and Fitness Outcomes
primaryOutcomeMeasure: muscle fitness, quality of life, upper extremity function
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* stage 0 to II breast cancer diagnosed within 5 years
* complete adjuvant therapy \> 2 months, except hormone therapy
* \> 18 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* disease in progress, recurrent, or metastasis
* medical or musculoskeletal condition which resistance exercise is contraindicated
* medication which may alter exercise response
